title: Anterior & Medial Deltoids (Front/Middle Delts)
description: The anterior and medial deltoids are two deltoid muscle's heads, the other head being the [posterior delt](/muscles/specifics/back/posterior-delts). The deltoid muscle is located on the shoulder, and its main function is to flex and internally rotate the arm at the shoulder joint, allowing for movements such as raising the arm forward and inward.
